metadata.subject: Book industries and trade
metadata.title: Jugement rendu par M. Le Noir, conseiller d'État, lieutenant-général de police, commissaire du conseil en cette partie :
metadata.creator: Paris (France).Lieutenant général de police
Paris (France). Lieutenant général de police
Lenoir, Jean-Charles-Pierre, 1732-1807
Lottin, Augustin-Martin, 1726-1793, printer
metadata.call_number: Case Wing folio Z144 .A1 v. 9 no. 18
metadata.publisher: [Paris] : De l'Imprimerie de Lottin l'aîne, imprimeur-libraire du roi & de la ville, rue S. Jacques, au Coq
metadata.description: Orders the seizure of goods and fines from several Parisian booksellers and printers for violations of codes governing the book trade
metadata.notes: Damaged, torn, stained and/or loose pages. Uneven binding. Skewed text. Title page and cover are combined.
